author: cmlenz
msg: Simplified site HTML, and fixed bug #26200 while at it

author: vmassol
msg: <action dev="vmassol" type="fix">
When running Cactus tests on an EJB project, through
cactus:test-ear, do not include the EJB sources in
the cactified WAR inside the EAR we deploy.
</action>

author: vmassol
msg: <action dev="VMA" type="update" fixes-bug="25034" due-to="Daniel Rabe" due-to-email="drabe@opentext.com">
The <cactus> task now also cleans custom tmp
directories (passed using the tmpdir attribute).
</action>

author: vmassol
msg: <action dev="VMA" type="fix" fixes-bug="25968" due-to="James Carpenter" due-to-email="jacarpenter@ercot.com">
Added support for specifying which JNDI port to use when shutting
down JBoss 3.x in the Cactus Ant integration.
The <jboss3x> nested element now supports the new
jndiport attribute for specifying the port. If not
specified, it defaults to 1099.
</action>

author: vmassol
msg: <action dev="VMA" type="fix" fixes-bug="25968" due-to="James Carpenter" due-to-email="jacarpenter@ercot.com">
Added support for specifying which JNDI port to use when shutting
down JBoss 3.x in the Cactus Ant integration.
The <jboss3x> nested element now supports the new
jndiport attribute for specifying the port. If not
specified, it defaults to 1099.
</action>
